mapper.select: SELECT A.plan_master_id, A.title, A.created_at AS createdAt , C.city_pic, C.color, C.city_kor_name AS cityName , COUNT(D.user_id) AS likeCnt FROM feed A LEFT JOIN plan_master B ON A.plan_master_id = B.plan_master_id LEFT JOIN city C ON B.city_id = C.city_id LEFT JOIN feed_like D ON A.plan_master_id = D.plan_master_id GROUP BY A.plan_master_id ORDER BY COUNT(D.user_id) DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT A.plan_master_id, A.title, A.created_at AS createdAt , C.city_pic, C.color, C.city_kor_name AS cityName , COUNT(D.user_id) AS likeCnt FROM feed A LEFT JOIN plan_master B ON A.plan_master_id = B.plan_master_id LEFT JOIN city C ON B.city_id = C.city_id LEFT JOIN feed_like D ON A.plan_master_id = D.plan_master_id GROUP BY A.plan_master_id ORDER BY COUNT(D.user_id) DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
